resources.string: دیکشنری به سه زبان ترکی انگلیسی فارسی \n آموزش به زبان فارسی و انگلیسی همزمان

گرامر تمام دروس 
 لغات تمام دروس 
 صداهای تمام دروس 
 کتاب pdf درس فعال 
 کتاب pdf تمرین فعال
خطا در دانلود فایل و دسترسی به اینترنت
به همراه کتاب دانش اموز و کتاب کار

منابع کتابها:n\ کتاب istanbul yabanci A1
 کتاب istanbul yabanci A2
 کتاب istanbul yabanci B1
 کتاب istanbul yabanci B2
 کتاب istanbul yabanci C1
 کتاب istanbul yabanci C1+
 منابع گیت هاب:n\ https://github.com/gabriel-TheCode/AestheticDialogs 
 https://github.com/gauravk95/bubble-navigation 
 https://github.com/Dmitry-Borodin/pdfview-android 
 https://github.com/itext/itextpdf/releases 
 https://github.com/google/volley

Mojtaba Behzadi-asl built the "istanbuli_bedoon" app . 
 Please read this Privacy Policy before using our services because it will tell you how we collect, store, use and disclose your personal information when providing these services to you.


Information collection and use 
 For a better experience, while using our Service, I may require you to provide us with certain personally identifiable information. The information that I request is retained on your device and is not collected by me in any way The app does use third party services that may collect information used to identify you.. 

 Link to privacy policy of third party service providers used by the app 
 · Google Play Services 
 · Firebase Analytics 
 

 Log Data 
 I want to inform you that whenever you use my Service, in a case of an error in the app I collect data and information (through third party products) on your phone called Log Data. This Log Data may include information such as your device Internet Protocol (“IP”) address, device name, operating system version, the configuration of the app when utilizing my Service, the time and date of your use of the Service, and other statistics. 

 Security
 I value your trust in providing us your Personal Information, thus we are striving to use commercially acceptable means of protecting it. But remember that no method of transmission over the internet, or method of electronic storage is 100% secure and reliable, and I cannot guarantee its absolute security. 

 Links to other sites 
 This Service may contain links to other sites. If you click on a third-party link, you will be directed to that site. Note that these external sites are not operated by me. Therefore, I strongly advise you to review the Privacy Policy of these websites. I have no control over and assume no responsibility for the content, privacy policies, or practices of any third-party sites or services 

 Information we use but never collect 
 In some of our service, we may need to access those datas or features to provide functions, but we never collect or store those informations.
 1. Read External Storage 
 2. Write External Storage 
 

 Physical damages 
 this app is safe and we test it before share it between users but there is always possibilities so there is no warranty if your device get physical damages after using this app. 

 Contact us 
 If you have any questions or suggestions about my Privacy Policy, do not hesitate to contact me.

 enbehzadi@gmail.com
